body.name: Gloria Runner Low Profile Medallion Washable Rug Anti Slip Backing Rugs for Living Room Light Weight Foldable Carpet (Multi, 2'X5')
features: ★【𝗠𝗔𝗖𝗛𝗜𝗡𝗘 𝗪𝗔𝗦𝗛𝗔𝗕𝗟𝗘 𝗔𝗥𝗘𝗔 𝗥𝗨𝗚】– You don't need to worry about your pet's activities creating unpredictable messy areas in your life. Washable rugs offer you a convenient way to clean your rugs and keep them in a consistently clean condition. If you only need to clean a small area of your carpet, you can wipe it down with a mild detergent and keep vacuuming regularly to extend the life of your area rug.

★【𝗗𝗘𝗖𝗢𝗥𝗔𝗧𝗜𝗩𝗘 𝗧𝗛𝗥𝗢𝗪 𝗖𝗔𝗥𝗣𝗘𝗧】– It's a good value especially if you like to trade out rugs for redecorating. Our aesthetic rugs are beautifully patterned and designed with neat hemming threads all around, which can perfectly decorate your living room, bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, dining room, kids’ room, sun room, office, entrance, patio, children's play area, nursery, residence, apartment, dormitory and other indoor and outdoor places, farmhouse area rug will give your decoration style a new look.

★【𝗡𝗢𝗡 𝗦𝗟𝗜𝗣 𝗗𝗢𝗧𝗧𝗘𝗗 𝗕𝗔𝗖𝗞𝗘𝗗 𝗥𝗨𝗚𝗦】– The back of the large area rug has been upgraded with tens of thousands of high-density anti-slip cotton points to enhance the friction between the rug for living room and the wood floor surface. Helping the area rug to stay in place in high-traffic areas and make it safer for your children, pets, and elderly people.

★【𝗘𝗔𝗦𝗬 𝗖𝗔𝗥𝗘】– Vacuum regularly to keep the area rugs clean on daily use. These Gloria rugs are machine washable with cold water. Do not use bleach. We recommend line drying or drying without heat on an air-only drying cycle. A low heat iron can be used if needed.

★【𝗙𝗥𝗜𝗘𝗡𝗗𝗟𝗬 𝗠𝗔𝗧𝗘𝗥𝗜𝗔𝗟】– Gloria rugs are safe for each family member and gives a thick and comfortable feel when people walk on it. The surface of the carpet is made up of high-quality materials so there is no need to worry about receiving a carpet with an unpleasant, pungent smell.

★【𝗗𝗘𝗦𝗜𝗚𝗡𝗘𝗗 𝗙𝗢𝗥 𝗥𝗘𝗔𝗟 𝗟𝗜𝗙𝗘】– Gloria rugs help to hold furniture such as beds and coffee tables or sofas and armchairs in place and are friendly to high-traffic areas. Enhance your space with a carpet on hardwood floors that easily match the room décor of any space living room, bedroom, dining room, foyer, in front of the fireplace or nursery.

★【𝗦𝗢𝗙𝗧 & 𝗡𝗢 𝗖𝗥𝗘𝗔𝗦𝗘】– The washable rug features a soft non-shedding velvet surface, has crinkle resistance. When your rug arrives, roll out smoothly on the flat area rugs for living room without crinkles. When you step on, you can feel it very comfortable.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Adorn your floors with the Premium Vintage Persian rug collection by Gloria. This machine washable Persian-inspired rug collection features traditional borders that frames scroll patterns with center medallions that will complement your existing home décor. Machine woven from soft polypropylene yarns are sure to give a cozy underfoot. Stain and fade resistant carpets will withstand the day-to-day wear and tear. Perfect for high traffic areas. Enhanced with durable nonslip dotted backing that creates stability and provides long-lasting shape and beauty. Perfect for home décor, room décor, and bedroom décor. Our rugs are crafted with care and attention to detail, making them the perfect addition to any room in your home. These Gloria rugs are beautifully made traditional area rugs for living room, kitchen, hallway runner, bedroom, and entryway. Decorate your home with this rug and enjoy it with pleasure.

MACHINE WASHABLE AREA RUG You don't need to worry about your pet's activities creating unpredictable messy areas in your life. Washable rugs offer you a convenient way to clean your rugs and keep them in a consistently clean condition. If you only need to clean a small area of your carpet, you can wipe it down with a mild detergent and keep vacuuming regularly to extend the life of your area rug. DECORATIVE THROW CARPET It's a good value especially if you like to trade out rugs for redecorating. Our aesthetic rugs are beautifully patterned and designed with neat hemming threads all around, which can perfectly decorate your living room, bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, dining room, kids’ room, sun room, office, entrance, patio, children's play area, nursery, residence, apartment, dormitory and other indoor and outdoor places, farmhouse area rug will give your decoration style a new look. NON SLIP DOTTED BACKED RUGS The back of the large area rug has been upgraded with tens of thousands of high-density anti-slip cotton points to enhance the friction between the rug for living room and the wood floor surface. Helping the area rug to stay in place in high-traffic areas and make it safer for your children, pets, and elderly people. EASY CARE Vacuum regularly to keep the area rugs clean on daily use. These Gloria rugs are machine washable with cold water. Do not use bleach. We recommend line drying or drying without heat on an air-only drying cycle. A low heat iron can be used if needed.

DESIGNED FOR REAL LIFE Gloria Rugs help to hold furniture such as beds and coffee tables or sofas and armchairs in place and are friendly to high-traffic areas. Enhance your space with a carpet on hardwood floors that easily match the room décor of any space living room, bedroom, dining room, foyer, in front of the fireplace or nursery. The washable rug features a soft non-shedding velvet surface, has crinkle resistance. When your rug arrives, roll out smoothly on the flat area rugs for living room without crinkles. When you step on, you can feel it very comfortable. Gloria rugs are safe for each family member and gives a thick and comfortable feel when people walk on it. The surface of the carpet is made up of high-quality materials so there is no need to worry about receiving a carpet with an unpleasant, pungent smell.
Brand Gloria Collection Callion Collection Colors Beige, Red, Navy, Multi, Brown, Gray Style Medallion Machine Washable YES Made In Turkey

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars an aesthetic carpet
reviews.reviewText: It is a quality carpet that is different from the classical carpets we are used to, from its smell to its texture. It added a new aesthetic appearance to my home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality Rug for great price
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love how this rug adds so much flavor, beauty and style to my apartment . I am so appreciative of it ! I will order a larger area future !!!
